concept.title: LZO and Snappy Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use LZO or Snappy compression with the Hadoop FS destination.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationLZO and Snappy compressioncompressionfor the Hadoop FS destinationTo use LZO or Snappy compression with Hadoop FS, you need to configure the to enable LZO or Snappy compression.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO or Snappy compression with only one version of Hadoop FS. If you installed multiple library versions, make sure to configure the to use compression with the version that you want to use.
